trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Clear-Content
trans-unit.target: Clear-Content

trans-unit.source: Clear-Content
trans-unit.target: Clear-Content

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Deletes the contents of an item, but does not delete the item.
trans-unit.target: 删除项的内容，但不删除该项。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路径 （默认值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Clear-Content** cmdlet deletes the contents of an item, such as deleting the text from a file, but it does not delete the item.
trans-unit.target: **Clear-content** cmdlet 删除项，例如从文件中删除文本的内容，但不会删除该项目。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the item exists, but it is empty.
trans-unit.target: 鉴于上述原因，项存在，但没有内容。

trans-unit.source: The **Clear-Content** is similar to Clear-Item, but it works on items with contents, instead of items with values.
trans-unit.target: **Clear-content** 类似于 Clear-item，但它适用于具有内容，而不是具有值的项的项。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Delete all content from a directory
trans-unit.target: 示例 1︰ 从目录中删除所有内容

trans-unit.source: This command deletes all of the content from the "init.txt" files in all subdirectories of the SmpUsers directory.
trans-unit.target: 此命令删除 SmpUsers 目录的所有子目录内的“init.txt”文件中的所有内容。

trans-unit.source: The files are not deleted, but they are empty.
trans-unit.target: 不删除这些文件，但它们为空。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Delete content of all files with a wildcard
trans-unit.target: 示例 2︰ 删除带有通配符的所有文件的内容

trans-unit.source: This command deletes the contents of all files in the current directory with the ".log" file name extension, including files with the read-only attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此命令删除当前目录中所有扩展名为“.log”的文件（包括具有只读属性的文件）的内容。

trans-unit.source: The asterisk (*) in the path represents all items in the current directory. The *Force* parameter makes the command effective on read-only files. Using a filter to restrict the command to files with the .log file name extension instead of specifying *.log in the path makes the operation faster.
trans-unit.target: 星号 (*) 的路径中表示当前目录中的所有项。 *强制* 参数使该命令有效只读文件。使用筛选器将该命令限定于扩展名为.log 文件而不是指定的文件 *.log 路径中的使操作速度更快。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定有权执行此操作的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 默认为当前用户。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as "User01" or "Domain01\User01", or enter a **PSCredential** object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名，例如"User01"或"Domain01\User01"; 或输入 **PSCredential** 对象，例如由 Get-credential cmdlet 生成。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果键入用户名，则将提示你输入密码。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not supported by any providers installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 随同 Windows PowerShell 一起安装的任何提供程序都不支持此参数。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, strings that this cmdlet omits from the path to the content.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个字符串数组，指定此 cmdlet 省略路径中的内容的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值限定 *路径* 参数。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as "*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 请输入路径元素或模式，例如“*.txt”。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: -Filter
trans-unit.target: 筛选器

trans-unit.source: Specifies a filter in the provider's format or language.
trans-unit.target: 以提供程序的格式或语言指定筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值限定 *路径* 参数。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the filter, including the use of wildcards, depends on the provider.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器的语法（包括通配符的使用）取决于提供程序。

trans-unit.source: Filters are more efficient than other parameters, because the provider applies them when retrieving the objects, rather than having Windows PowerShell filter the objects after they are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器比其他参数更有效，因为提供程序是在检索对象时应用筛选器，而不是在检索对象后再由 Windows PowerShell 筛选对象。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Forces the command to run without asking for user confirmation.
trans-unit.target: 强制运行命令而不要求用户确认。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, content that this cmdlet clears.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个字符串数组，指定此 cmdlet 清除的内容。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的值限定 *路径* 参数。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as "*.txt".
trans-unit.target: 请输入路径元素或模式，例如“*.txt”。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the paths to the items from which content is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 指定要删除其内容的项的路径。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the *Path* parameter, the value of *LiteralPath* is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 与不同 *路径* 参数、 的值 *LiteralPath* 完全按照其键入时，才使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 不会将任何字符解释为通配符。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径包括转义符，请将其括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell having Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 单引号引起来告诉再由 Windows PowerShell 不将任何字符解释为转义序列。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the paths to the items from which content is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 指定要删除其内容的项的路径。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: The paths must be paths to items, not to containers.
trans-unit.target: 此路径必须是指向该项的路径，而不是容器的路径。

trans-unit.source: For example, you must specify a path to one or more files, not a path to a directory.
trans-unit.target: 例如，必须指定一个或多个文件的路径，而不是目录的路径。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允许使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required, but the parameter name ("Path") is optional.
trans-unit.target: 此参数为必需参数，但参数名（“Path”）为可选项。

trans-unit.source: -Stream
trans-unit.target: 数据流

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as "User01" or "Domain01\User01", or enter a **PSCredential** object, such as one generated by the **Get-Credential** cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名，例如"User01"或"Domain01\User01"; 或输入 **PSCredential** 对象，如生成的 **Get-credential** cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果键入用户名，则将提示你输入密码。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not supported by any providers installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 随同 Windows PowerShell 一起安装的任何提供程序都不支持此参数。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在活动事务中使用该命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅包括在活动事务中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题后面的

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe objects to **Clear-Content**.
trans-unit.target: 无法通过管道将对象传递给 **Clear-content**。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not return any objects.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 不返回任何对象。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to **Clear-Content** by its built-in alias, "clc".
trans-unit.target: 此外可以指 **Clear-content** 通过其内置别名"clc"。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: If you omit the *Path* parameter name, the value of the *Path* parameter must be the first parameter in the command.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略 *路径* 参数名称、 的值 *路径* 参数必须是在命令中的第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: For instance, `Clear-Content c:\mydir\*.txt`.
trans-unit.target: 例如， `Clear-Content c:\mydir\*.txt`。

trans-unit.source: If you include the parameter name, you can list the parameters in any order.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含参数名称，则可以以任何顺序列出参数。

trans-unit.source: You can use **Clear-Content** with the Windows PowerShell FileSystem provider and with other providers that manipulate content.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 **Clear-content** 与 Windows PowerShell FileSystem 提供程序和其他可操作内容的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: To clear items that are not considered to be content, such as items managed by the Windows PowerShell Certificate or Registry providers, use Clear-Item.
trans-unit.target: 若要清除不视为内容的项（例如 Windows PowerShell Certificate 或 Registry 提供程序所管理的项），请使用 Clear-Item。

trans-unit.source: The **Clear-Content** cmdlet is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: **Clear-content** cmdlet 用于处理由任何提供程序公开的数据。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type `Get-PsProvider`.
trans-unit.target: 若要列出会话中可用的提供程序，请键入 `Get-PsProvider`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.target: Add-Content
